option1.message: Numero de artículos del Historial Reciente

option3.message: Numero de Los artículos Más Visitados

option4.message: Numero de  of Recently Bookmarked Items

option16.message: Restaurar Articulo to Los más visitados

help1.message: El número de artículos historial reciente in the pop-up

help2.message: El número de Pestañas cerradas recientemente in the pop-up

help3.message: El número of most visited items in the pop-up

help4.message: El número of recently bookmarked items in the pop-up

help5.message: The order in which the specified items will be shown

help6.message: Which history manager you would like to use

help7.message: The format of the date used throughout the extension

help8.message: The search bar situated at the top of the pop-up

help10.message: The page URL situated below the item title

help11.message: The separator situated at the bottom of the item

help12.message: The extra information next to the page URL (i.e. visit count and date)

help13.message: If activated will display a different colour for different items such as a bookmarked or pinned URL in the recent history and recently closed tabs list

help16.message: The URLs you have removed from the most visited list. Click on the cross next to the URL to restore it to the list.

help17.message: The URLs from the domain names you do not wish to be displayed in the recent history list, e.g. foobar.com

help18.message: What should happen when you click on an item in the pop-up

help20.message: The format of the time used throughout the extension

help21.message: This adds a share icon next to items in the pop-up when editing

translation1.message: Por favor ayude a hacer que Historial Reciente mejore,proporcionando traducciones mejores y nueva para ello. Esta página a sido creada para que sea más fácil para usted para traducir esta extensión.

translation2.message: Por favor siga los pasos para traducir Historial Reciente en su lenguaje:

translation3.message: Scroll to the bottom of this page.

translation5.message: Traducir todos los 'mesajes' en su lenguaje elegido.

aboutText.message: Esta extension muestra tú historial reciente, pestañas cerradas recientemente,paginas más visitadas y marcadores recientes en un solo click pop-up.

ui3.message: Borrar artículo from pestañas cerradas recientemente?

ui5.message: Borrar el artículo de la lista de los más visitados?

tip1.message: Pop-up: You can open an item in a new background tab by left clicking the item while pressing and holding down Ctrl.

tip2.message: Pop-up: By clicking on the cogs next to the titles you can delete, pin and share items.

tip3.message: Opciones: You can press the up and down keys to increase and decrease numerical values when the field is selected.

tip4.message: Opciones: You can press Enter to add a domain to the filtered list.

tip5.message: Historial: You can use Shift click to select multiple items.

tip6.message: Historial: Use the buttons in the blue toolbar to manipulate the way the history items are shown.
